mapper.select: select A.id,A.title,A.update_time,A.create_time,A.news_category,A.origin,B.name,B.name from news A left join category B on A.`category_id` = B.id WHERE A.`delete` = 0 and B.`delete`=0 order by A.update_time DESC

select A.id,A.title,A.update_time,A.create_time,A.news_category,A.origin,B.name from news A left join category B on A.`category_id` = B.id WHERE A.news_category=#{newsCategory} and A.`delete` = 0 order by A.update_time DESC
select A.*,B.name,B.name from news A left join category B on A.`category_id` = B.id WHERE A.id = #{id} and A.`delete` = 0 order by A.update_time DESC
select B.* from news A left join exhibition B on A.`category_id` = B.`category_id` where A.id = #{id} and A.`delete` = 0 and B.`delete` = 0 order by B.`update_time` desc
select count(*) from news A where A.`delete` = 0
